name: Vespera
title: Idealized Arcanist
description: Vespera are beings whose forms are shaped as much by will and magic as by flesh.
Their beauty feels intentional rather than ornamental, as if reality itself bends to present them as they believe they should be.
They are often mistaken for illusions or divine constructs by those unfamiliar with their nature.
traits: Emotional state subtly alters physical features
Magical presence causes faint environmental distortion
notes: Vespera culture values self-perception and mastery of identity.
Prolonged exposure to corrupted magic can fracture a Vespera into darker variants.
